unnormalised: My cousin, Priya Sharma, had to file for divorce citing IPC Section 498A after facing years of harassment; the case is ongoing in the Delhi High Court, listed for hearing on 22/08/2024.
normalised: My cousin, P-R-I-Y-A Sharma, had to file for divorce citing I-P-C Section four hundred and ninety eight A after facing years of harassment; the case is ongoing in the Delhi High Court, listed for hearing on twenty second August two thousand and twenty four.
